content.html: linux clipboards are great if you want your OS to gaslight you you have a text file open, you hit paste, it pasts "foo" you select "bar", hit cut, "bar" disappears you hit paste, "foo" appears where did bar go why is foo still here
content.value:
linux clipboards are great if you want your OS to gaslight you
you have a text file open, you hit paste, it pasts "foo"
you select "bar", hit cut, "bar" disappears
you hit paste, "foo" appears

where did bar go
why is foo still here
